text: There ’ s much to chew on in this morning ’ s BAFTA Film Awards nominations. The 6, 500 - strong British Academy of Film and Television Arts tossed a lot of love towards titles with UK - centric stories and / or pedigrees while embracing Guillermo del Toro ’ s lyrical fantasy The Shape Of Water. The Fox Searchlight film, for which del Toro won the Directing Golden Globe on Sunday, scored a leading 12 nominations. The group entirely snubbed Steven Spielberg ’ s The Post, a serious and timely Oscar candidate, giving it zero mentions.
